00073 //
00074 // HOWTO START THIS PARALLEL OPTIMIZATION EXAMPLE:
00075 //
00076 // Setup your PVM-environent and recompile this source.
00077 // Start the pvm console, i.e., call the command 
00078 //  '... /PVM-binpath/pvm'.
00079 // For example, add 3 hosts from your local network to your parallel virtual machine, i.e., 
00080 //  'add host1 host2 host3'.
00081 // Start the pvmSphereGA, i.e, 
00082 //  'spawn -> -4 ${SHARKHOME}/EALib/examples/pvmSphereGA_${ARCH} [random-seed]'.
00083 //
00084 // Assuming equal random seed initializations, however, there might be different results compared to 
00085 // 'sphereGA' or even to another restart of 'pvmSphereGA'. This is due to different orderings of 
00086 // Individuals within the Population which might occur in the parallel case using the roulette wheel 
00087 // selection within the proportional selection scheme.
00088 
00089

00133 int main (int argn,char *argv[]){
00134 
00135   std::cout << "# PVM process attemps to start ... " 
00136             << std::endl;
00137 
00139   //
00140   // Parameter initialization
00141   //
00142   
00143   // PVM constants and variables
00144   //
00145   char*       PVM_groupname      = "PVM-Test";
00146   const int   PVM_groupsize      = 4         ;
00147   const int   PVM_sendExitTag    = 3         ;
00148   const int   PVM_sendFitnessTag = 2         ;
00149   const int   PVM_sendEvalTag    = 1         ;
00150   const int   PVM_MasterID       = 0         ;
00151   int inum, tid;
00152   
00153   // EALib constants and variables
00154   //
00155   const unsigned PopSize     = 50 ;
00156   const unsigned Dimension   = 20 ;
00157   const unsigned NumOfBits   = 10;
00158   const unsigned Iterations  = 2000;
00159   const unsigned DspInterval = 10 ;
00160   const unsigned NElitists   = 1;
00161   const unsigned Omega       = 5;
00162   const unsigned CrossPoints = 2;
00163   const double   CrossProb   = 0.6;
00164   const double   FlipProb    = 1. / ( Dimension * NumOfBits );
00165   const bool     UseGrayCode = true;
00166   const Interval RangeOfValues( -3, +5 );
00167 
00168   unsigned i, t;
00169 
00170   int myseed = ( argn > 1 ? atoi( argv[ 1 ] ) : 1234 );
00171 
00173   //
00174   // Parallel processing
00175   //
00176   
00177   // require a unique task-ID and apply for the PVM-group
00178   //
00179   tid  = pvm_mytid(); 
00180 
00181   if(tid < 0){
00182     std::cerr << std::endl 
00183               << "There is something going wrong ... " << std::endl
00184               << "maybe you forgot to spawn processes from the pvm-console."  << std::endl << std::endl
00185               << "Please try the following." << std::endl<< std::endl
00186               << "Start the pvm-console, i.e., call the command '... /$(PVM-binpath)/pvm'." << std::endl
00187               << "After the pvm-console has started, for example, add 3 hosts from your local network" << std::endl 
00188               << "to your parallel virtual machine (PVM), i.e., call 'add host1 host2 host3'." << std::endl 
00189               << "Start " << argv[0] << " from the pvm console, i.e, call"<< std::endl 
00190               << "'spawn -> -4 $(SHARKHOME)/EALib/examples/" << argv[0] << " [optional random-seed]'." << std::endl << std::endl;
00191     exit(-1);
00192   } else 
00193     std::cout << "# ... process with TID " << tid << " started" 
00194               << " successfully. Please hold on for results." 
00195               << std::endl;
00196 
00197   inum = pvm_joingroup(PVM_groupname);
00198 
00199   // synchronize all processes
00200   //
00201   pvm_barrier(PVM_groupname, PVM_groupsize);
00202 
00203   // distinction between master and slave processes
00204   //
00205   if(inum == PVM_MasterID) 
00206     {
00207       //
00208       //  Master process
00209       //
00210       Rng::seed( myseed );
00211 
00212       // define populations
00213       //
00214       static Population parents   ( PopSize, ChromosomeT< bool >( Dimension * NumOfBits ) );
00215       static Population offspring ( PopSize, ChromosomeT< bool >( Dimension * NumOfBits ) );
00216       
00217       // scaling window
00218       //
00219       std::vector< double > window( Omega );
00220       
00221       // minimization task
00222       //
00223       parents  .setMinimize( );
00224       offspring.setMinimize( );
00225       
00226       // initialize all chromosomes of parent population
00227       //
00228       for( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i )
00229         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< bool >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ).initialize( );
00230 
00231       // send and receive individuals
00232       //
00233       if(NElitists>0)
00234         pvmMasterSendReceive(parents, PVM_groupname, PVM_groupsize, PVM_sendEvalTag, PVM_sendFitnessTag);
00235       
00236       for( t = 0; t < Iterations; ++t ) 
00237         {
00238           // recombine by crossing over two parents
00239           //
00240           offspring = parents;
00241           for( i = 0; i < offspring.size( )-1; i += 2 )
00242           if( Rng::coinToss( CrossProb ) )
00243             offspring[ i ][ 0 ].crossover( offspring[ i+1 ][ 0 ],
00244                                            CrossPoints );
00245           
00246           // mutate by flipping bits
00247           //
00248           for( i = 0; i < offspring.size( ); ++i )
00249             dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< bool >& >( offspring[ i ][ 0 ] ).flip( FlipProb );
00250 
00251           // send and receive individuals
00252           //
00253           pvmMasterSendReceive(offspring, 
00254                                PVM_groupname, 
00255                                PVM_groupsize, 
00256                                PVM_sendEvalTag, 
00257                                PVM_sendFitnessTag);
00258 
00259           // scale fitness values and use proportional selection
00260           //
00261           offspring.linearDynamicScaling( window, t );
00262           parents.selectProportional( offspring, NElitists );
00263 
00264           // print out best value found so far
00265           //
00266           if( t % DspInterval == 0 )
00267             std::cout << t << "\tbest value = "
00268                       << parents.best( ).fitnessValue( ) << "\n";
00269         }
00270       
00271       // exit slave processess
00272       //
00273       for (int i=1; i < PVM_groupsize; i++)
00274         {
00275           pvm_initsend(PvmDataDefault);
00276           pvm_send(pvm_gettid(PVM_groupname,i),PVM_sendExitTag);
00277         }
00278     } 
00279   else 
00280     {
00281       //
00282       //  Slave processess
00283       //
00284 
00285       // Note, if random sampling is required it should be ensured 
00286       // that all slaves apply different random seed initializations
00287       //
00288       // Rng::seed(myseed + inum);
00289       
00290       // receive, evaluate and send parents (only needed for elitist strategy)
00291       //
00292       pvmSlaveReceiveSend(PVM_groupname,
00293                           PVM_groupsize, 
00294                           PVM_MasterID, 
00295                           PVM_sendExitTag, 
00296                           PVM_sendFitnessTag,
00297                           PVM_sendEvalTag,
00298                           RangeOfValues,
00299                           NumOfBits,
00300                           UseGrayCode
00301                           );
00302     }
00303 
00304   // synchronize all processes  
00305   //
00306   pvm_barrier(PVM_groupname,PVM_groupsize);
00307   
00309   //
00310   // Finish all processes
00311   //
00312   std::cout << "# PVM process with TID " << tid << " will halt now... " << std::endl
00313             << std::endl;
00314     
00315   pvm_exit();
00316 }

00320 //=======================================================================
00321 //
00322 // fitness function: sphere model
00323 //
00324 double sphere( const std::vector< double >& x )
00325 {
00326   unsigned i;
00327   double   sum;
00328   for( sum = 0., i = 0; i < x.size( ); i++ )
00329     sum += sqr( x[ i ] );
00330   return sum;
00331 }
00332 
00333 //=======================================================================
00334 //
00335 // send and receive routine of the master
00336 //
00337 void pvmMasterSendReceive(Population& pop          , 
00338                           char*       PVM_groupname,
00339                           const int   PVM_groupsize,
00340                           const int   msgTagSend   ,
00341                           const int   msgTagReceive
00342                           )
00343 {
00344   unsigned i;
00345 
00346   for(i=0; i < pop.size( ); ++i )
00347     {
00348       // send all individuals of pop to slave processes for evaluation 
00349       //
00350       pvm_initsend(PvmDataDefault);
00351       pop[i].pvm_pkind();
00352       pvm_send(pvm_gettid(PVM_groupname,i%(PVM_groupsize-1)+1),msgTagSend);
00353     }
00354   
00355   int bufid=0; int counter = pop.size();
00356 
00357   while(counter > 0)
00358     {      
00359       // check whether any individual has returned from parallel evaluation
00360       //
00361       do
00362         { 
00363           bufid = pvm_probe(-1,msgTagReceive);
00364         } while (bufid == 0);
00365       
00366       // in case, integrate the evaluated individual in the Population pop
00367       //
00368       if(bufid>0)
00369         {
00370           // extract obligatory information from the message
00371           //
00372           int bytes; int msgtag; int tid;
00373           pvm_bufinfo(bufid, &bytes, &msgtag, &tid);
00374           
00375           // receive individual and overwrite not evaluated individuals with evaluated ones
00376           //
00377           pvm_recv(tid,msgtag);
00378           pop[pop.size()-counter].pvm_upkind();
00379           counter--;      
00380         }
00381     }
00382 }
00383 
00384 //=======================================================================
00385 //
00386 // receive, evaluate and send routine of the slave
00387 //
00388 void pvmSlaveReceiveSend(char*          PVM_groupname,
00389                          const int      PVM_groupsize, 
00390                          const int      PVM_MasterID ,
00391                          const int      msgTagExit   , 
00392                          const int      msgTagSend   ,
00393                          const int      msgTagReceive,
00394                          const Interval RangeOfValues,
00395                          const unsigned NumOfBits    ,
00396                          const bool     UseGrayCode
00397                          )
00398 {
00399   int bufid, bufidExit=0;
00400   
00401   while(bufidExit == 0)
00402         {
00403           // check whether any individual has arrived from the master process
00404           //
00405           do
00406             { 
00407               bufid     = pvm_probe(pvm_gettid(PVM_groupname,PVM_MasterID),msgTagReceive);
00408               bufidExit = pvm_probe(pvm_gettid(PVM_groupname,PVM_MasterID),msgTagExit)   ;
00409               if (bufidExit != 0) 
00410                 pvm_recv(pvm_gettid(PVM_groupname,PVM_MasterID),msgTagExit)              ;
00411             } while ((bufid == 0) && (bufidExit == 0));
00412           
00413           // in case, evaluate individual and return it to the sender
00414           //
00415           if (bufid != 0)
00416             {
00417               // extract obligatory information from the message
00418               //
00419               int bytes; int msgtag; int tid;
00420               pvm_bufinfo(bufid, &bytes, &msgtag, &tid);
00421 
00422               // receive individual 
00423               //
00424               Individual ind(ChromosomeT<bool>(1));
00425               pvm_recv(tid,msgtag);
00426               ind.pvm_upkind();
00427 
00428               // evaluate objective function
00429               //
00430               ChromosomeT< double > dblchrom;
00431               dblchrom.decodeBinary( ind[ 0 ], RangeOfValues, NumOfBits, UseGrayCode );
00432               ind.setFitness( sphere( dblchrom ) );
00433 
00434               // return evaluated individua to the sender
00435               //
00436               pvm_initsend(PvmDataDefault);
00437               ind.pvm_pkind();
00438               pvm_send(tid,msgTagSend);
00439             }
00440         }
00441 }
